about_the_game:
HOPE is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players set in the 1930s. Face demons while searching for the necessary items to perform exorcisms in various terrifying locations. Command, Explore, Exorcise, and Survive.

ARE YOU READY?

  • Cooperative mode for 1-4 players.
    Join up to 4 exorcists in this unique experience where you must work together to free possessed souls and dodge malevolent forces.

  • Intense gameplay
    Every session of HOPE offers a different experience. To defeat evil, you need a synchronized team and flawless execution, with gameplay sessions that can last over an hour.

  • Solo mode
    Test your skills by facing the terror alone and prove your courage.

    CAN YOU CONQUER EVIL?

  • Immersive environments
    Each setting features terrifying manifestations of the demon Astaroth, along with new places to explore, items to find, allies to save, and ancient rituals to perform.

  • AI control with voice commands
    Use voice commands like "Back", "Go Away", "Run" while holding a crucifix. Your voice is your main tool for control and survival.

  • Perform exorcisms with sacred texts in Latin
    Use your voice to recite sacred texts in Latin to perform exorcisms. Precision and faith in your words are crucial to freeing trapped souls.

  • Freeing the possessed.
    Your mission is to save souls from the clutches of the demon Astaroth. In each map, work as a team to find the 12 ritual items needed, some of which have a life of their own, to break the possession completely.

  • Adjustable difficulty
    Astaroth's power grows over time, as do the enemies trying to stop you. Your only defense is your voice.

  • Character creation and customization system
    Customize your exorcist with a wide range of clothing options, creating a unique character for your adventure.

  • High replayability
    Closed doors, ritual items, and other elements are randomly generated, ensuring each session is unique. HOPE’s AI adds an extra challenge, making every decision count.
